mapper.select: SELECT odi.order_no, pt.prt_code, pt.prt_name, odi.order_qty, ods.d_day FROM orders ods JOIN order_inf odi ON ods.order_no = odi.order_no JOIN product pt ON pt.prt_code= odi.prt_code WHERE odi.order_yn = 'N' ORDER BY odi.order_no ASC

SELECT pe.order_no, pe.pre_no, pt.prt_name, pt.prt_code ,pe.pre_qty, pe.ins_qty, pe.pre_date, pe.pre_manager,ee.emp_name ,ods.d_day FROM orders ods JOIN produce pe ON ods.order_no = pe.order_no JOIN product pt ON pt.prt_code = pe.prt_code JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = pe.pre_manager ORDER BY ods.order_no ASC

SELECT ods.order_no, pe.pre_no, pe.pre_date, pe.pre_manager, pe.ins_qty, pe.pre_qty, pe.prt_code, pe.pre_prg FROM produce pe JOIN orders ods ON pe.order_no = ods.order_no
ods.order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_inf set order_yn = CASE WHEN order_yn = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END where order_no = #{orderNo} AND prt_code = #{prtCode}
